column3: > I think this can be simplified further to use only one CallOneOf but still achieve the same thing: fjahr@2ff513b. I also added some more comments there and used a constant for the initial state hash which should help the speed some more.\n\nThanks for the 2am review and code suggestion. Took ~your branch and squashed into one commit.
Speedup: Locally it now takes 29% of the original time
I think this line is redundant.
